definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: represent, be like (Ar. ma3ala stand erect (cf. Fl:De Pr 1:1), II. effigiavit, representavit (rem alicui), v. imitate, use a verse as a poverb; ma3alun description by way of comparison; As. mašâlu, Dl:HWB 451 f.; Eth. masala: become like; Aram. [[מְתַל]] be like, mtal compare).

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. 1 s. [[וׇאֶתְמַשֵּׁל]] Job 30:19 (c. [[כְּ]]) and I have become like dust..
